name: 芸能記事
text:
『シーズ、
圧巻のアカペラパフォーマンスでアリーナを魅了』
trans:
"SHHis Mesmerize With a Surprise A Capella
Performance"

name: プロデューサー
text:
────なるほどな
面白いんじゃないか……！
trans:
────Oh, I see.
I think that sounds exciting...!

name: にちか
text:
ほんとですか……！
────美琴さんっ
trans:
You really do...?
────What about you, Mikoto-san?

name: 美琴
trans:
...Mm.
I think so as well.

name: 美琴
text:
リフターでは、動きを捨てて
ハーモニーを魅せる……
trans:
Rather than attempting to move while on lifters,
we can instead charm them with our harmony...

name: 美琴
text:
アカペラは、理に適っていると思う
いいアイディアじゃない？
trans:
So doing a capella makes a lot of sense.
I think it's a good idea.

name: にちか
trans: Y-yes...!

name: にちか
text:
私たちの前も後ろもテクノとかダンス系のユニットだし
差が作れるのかな、ってふうにも思って……
trans:
There are a lot of units out there that do techno or
dance music... I was thinking this might set us apart
from all the others.

name: プロデューサー
text:
確かにな
今回は生演奏じゃないから、ステージ上の変更もない
trans:
You've got a point there. Also, since there is no live
backing band at this performance, no changes would
need to be made to the stage set-up.

name: 美琴
text:
ダンスのある曲も、
かえって引き立つかもしれない
trans:
For songs that have choreography,
this might actually be preferable.

name: にちか
trans: Yes...!

name: プロデューサー
text: うん、舞台監督にすぐ連絡してみるよ
trans: Well then, I go ahead and contact the stage director.

name: にちか
trans: Yay...!

name: 美琴
text: じゃあ、すぐ練習に入らないとね
trans: In that case, we'll need to start practicing for this.

name: 美琴
text:
リフターで上がってアカペラ……
上手くなかったら、ものすごい逆効果だから
trans:
When you're attempting something as striking as
a capella from the top of a lifter...
A poor performance will stand out.

name: 芸能記事
text:
『実力派ユニット、シーズ！
灼熱の夏フェスステージを完全レポート』
trans:
"SHHis, a Unit with Genuine Talent!
A Detailed Report of Their Passionate
Summer Music Festival Performance!"

name: にちか
text:
は、はい……それは、やります
めちゃくちゃ練習やります
trans:
Y-yes... I'm prepared to do what it takes.
I'm going to practice this until I drop.

name: にちか
text: いいステージに────したいので……！
trans:
Since, I want────
To bring an excellent performance...!

name: プロデューサー
text:
はは、うん
絶対に取り付けてくるから、もう練習しててくれ
trans:
Haha, that's right.
I'm positive that I'll be able to get the change signed
off on, so please, go ahead and start practicing.

name: にちか＆美琴
trans: Yes...!

name: 美琴
trans: The Abyss.

name: 現場スタッフ
text:
はい、シーズおふたりステージ上げまーす
入ってください！
trans:
Okay, SHHis, it's time for to go on up to the stage.
Step onto your platforms, please.

name: 美琴
text:
見上げる場所、始める場所
ここを上がった時のために、全てがある
trans:
The place you look upwards from.
The place where you begin.
Everything exists for the moment you rise above it.

name: にちか
trans: The Abyss.

name: にちか
text:
ステージの下
客席のざわめきをいちばん感じる場所
trans:
The basement below the stage.
The place where you can feel the excitement of the
audience the most.

name: にちか
text: ここを上がった時のために、全てがある
trans: Everything exists for the moment you rise above it.

name: にちか
text: ────そんなふうに言ってみたい
trans: ────I want to try thinking of it like that.

name: 現場スタッフ
trans: Alright, up you go.

name: にちか
trans:
...
Mikoto-san...

name: 芸能記事
text: 『ブレイク目前！　シーズがダンスフロアを揺らす』
trans: "Up and Coming Unit SHHis Shake the Dance Floor!"

name: ルカ
trans: ────────aaaaaAAAAAAA...

name: 芸能記事
text: 『独占！　シーズ、プライベートフォト！』
trans: "Exclusive! New Private Photographs of SHHis!"

name: ルカ
trans: It hurts.

name: にちか
trans: ────Mikoto-san...?

name: 美琴
trans: ...Oh, hello there.

name: にちか
text:
お疲れ様です！
事務所だったら、私も一緒にいいですか……？
trans:
Hello!
If you're also on your way to the office, can I come
along with you...?

name: 美琴
trans: Sure.

name: にちか
text:
……あんまり
一緒に事務所に行ったことってないですよね
trans:
...You know, we haven't really walked to the office
together much, have we.

name: 美琴
trans: ...We haven't?

name: にちか
trans: Y-yes! We really haven't...!

name: にちか
text:
なんていうか、
ずっと違う世界の人っていう感じがしてて……
trans:
I guess it's kinda like, you always seemed like you
were someone from a whole different world...

name: 美琴
text:
……そうなの？
そんな感じはしなかったけど
trans:
...Really?
I never felt that way, myself.

name: にちか
text: さ、最初の頃は、舞い上がってたので……！
trans:
S-since you know, when I was just starting out,
you were already established and all...

name: にちか
trans:
...?
Are you interested in that piano...?

name: にちか
text: よく鳴ってますよね、あそこのやつ
trans: You hear it lot, walking around here.

name: 美琴
trans: Mm.

name: 美琴
trans: Want to try playing it?

name: にちか
trans: Eh?

name: 美琴
text: 『メンデルスゾーン無言歌集第３巻　Op.38 ５．イ短調』
trans:
"Mendelssohn's Songs Without Words, Book 3, Op.38
no.5 in A Minor"

name: にちか
trans: ...Huh?

name: 美琴
text:
この曲の名前
────これ、誰でも弾いていいんだよね？
trans:
It's the name of this piece.
────This piano is for public use, right?

name: にちか
text:
あぁ……！　はい
弾くのは自由みたいですけど……
trans:
Ohhh...! Yes.
It does seem like anyone is free to play it...

name: 美琴
trans: Let's see... Here's the switch.

name: にちか
trans: Wow...

name: にちか
trans:
...
Amazing...

name: 美琴
trans: ...I'm not sure I remember how to play the rest.

name: にちか
trans:
Wow...!
Y-you're amazing...!

name: にちか
trans: You really are from a totally different world...!

name: 美琴
text:
全然
これを弾ける人、数えきれないほどいるよ
trans:
Not at all.
There must be countless people who are able
to play this piece.

name: 美琴
text: ──でも、人の心をつかめるかどうかはわからない
trans:
──But, does it have the ability to move a person's
heart? That I can't say.

name: にちか
text:
────
『ホーム・スイート・ホーム』……
trans:
────
"Home Sweet Home"...

name: にちか
trans: ...Hehe.

name: にちか
trans: ...Whew...

name: にちか
trans: Ahaha.

name: 美琴
trans: ...Should we get going?

name: にちか
trans: Oh, yes we should...!

name: プロデューサー
text: にちかは、幸せになるんだ
trans: You'll find your happiness, Nichika.

name: にちか
trans: ────I just might.

name: にちか
text: 全部があった頃みたいに
trans: Like how it was, back when I had everything.

name: にちか
text:
……って
思った。その時は、一瞬
trans:
...Or, so I had thought.
For that single second, I nearly believed.

name: 美琴
trans: ...Yes.

name: 美琴
trans:
Mm.
...I see.

name: スポンサー企業
text:
今度あの子頼むよ～！　今人気のほら、シーズの！
あのちょっと上手くない方の子！
trans:
We'd like that one girl～!
From that group that's big right now uh, SHHis!
You know, the one who's kinda amateurish!

name: 広告マン
text:
シーズ、
七草にちかさんへの出演希望かなり来てましてー
trans:
Many guest appearance requests have been coming
in regarding Nichika Nanakusa from SHHis.

name: 美琴
text:
いいことじゃない？
ひとりで出てもらっても私はかまわないけど
trans:
That's a positive thing, isn't it?
If she's the only one they want to bring on, it's fine
by me.

name: 美琴
trans: Mm.

name: 美琴
trans: ────I've seen this happen before.

name: 企画ディレクター
text:
シーズのにちかちゃん！　あの子引っぱりたいの
地味だけど、しゃべらせると結構おもろいのよね
trans:
Nichika-chan from SHHis! She's the one we want.
She's a tad plain, but once you get her talking, she's
hilarious.

name: ルカ
text:
────違うんだよ、美琴……
違うの、違う……っ
trans:
────It's not like that, Mikoto...
You've got it twisted, that isn't...

name: ルカ
trans: I want to do this alongside you, Mikoto──────!

name: 美琴
text:
……それだけ？
わかった、わざわざ連絡ありがとう
trans:
...Is that all you wanted to tell me?
Understood, thanks for going out of your way to
let me know

name: 美琴
trans: I need to get back to practicing.

name: 美琴
trans:
...Mm.
See you later, then.

name: にちか
trans: The Abyss.

name: にちか
text:
ステージの下
客席のざわめきをいちばん感じる場所
trans:
The basement below the stage.
The place where you can feel the excitement of the
audience the most.

name: にちか＆美琴
trans:
(The moment you rise above it, you'll be all alone.)
[Everything exists for the moment you rise above it.]
